attributes.action: justice for James Birks age 13 wednesbury
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is for James Birks who was hit by a van in wednesbury town in april. James was left with a serious head injury which has left him having to relearn everything over again. The driver was let off with this so were petitioning to get something done about this. please help us get justice for James and his family
thanks
